get.description: Gets a paged list of `Subscription` objects.
Gets a paged list of `EventType` objects.

page.name: page
page.description: The page number of items to return. (1 by default)

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: The desired number of items per page. (25 by default)

hasErrors.description: Set true when status.isSuccess is false.

isValid.description: Set false on API parameter validation failures.

eventType.description: A type of event that can be subscribed to.

isSuccess.description: False when errorCode is not None or there is an errorMessage or validationFailures.

uri.description: The URI of the resource to send the web hook to

secret.description: The secret key that will be used when generating the request signature.  If left blank, requests will not be signed.

isActive.description: Whether the subscription is currently active or not

incidentAssociationType.description: Defines key/value pairs permitted in an incident association.

setValues.description: A semicolon separated list of values permitted in the set.

incidentAssociation.description: Defines associations between the incident and other entities. Supported key values include Asset.ExternalId, Area, Subarea.

id.description: Type: Guid. Identifier for this incident.
Type: Guid. Identifier for this incident.
Type: Guid. Identifier for this incident type.

subscription.description: A subscription to a web hook event.

uri.description: The URI of the resource to send the web hook to

secret.description: The secret key that will be used when generating the request signature

isActive.description: Whether the subscription is currently active or not

createdOn.description: The datetime the subscription was created

modifiedOn.description: The datetime the subscription was last modified

assignmentTime.description: what time the task was assigned by the task management system

assignor.description:
The user ID of the person assigning the task.  
The assignor will see the tasklist and will be able to see updates to the task model.
Note, the ID here must match in both the external system and AlertSense

assignees.description:
The collection of users who are assigned the tasklist.  
All of these users will see the tasks as \"to-do\".
Note - the id in these asignee (user) records must match in both the 
external system and AlertSense, so user IDs must be synchronized between 
the two systems.

completed.description: true if the entire tasklist has been completed

tasks.description: The collection of tasks that have been assigned.

tasklist.description: A collection of tasks assigned to a collection of assignees by an assignor.  AlertSense will manage this model as assignees act on the task list, providing updates via webhooks.

sequence.description: the order of this task in the list

title.description: title of the task - short name

description.description: more detailed instructions for the task

completed.description: true if the task has been completed

deferred.description: true if the task has been deferred

activities.description: Collection of activities associated with this task

assignee.description: The assignee who did the activity

taskActivity.description: Activity logged against an assigned task

id.description: The Id of the web hook to update

uri.description: The URI of the resource to send the web hook to

secret.description: The secret key that will be used when generating the request signature.  If left blank, requests will not be signed.

isActive.description: Whether the subscription is currently active or not
